java.lang.Object

                  edu.luc.cs.trull.SingleChildCombinator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Combinator, Component, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
Direct Known Subclasses:
AwaitAll, Loop, Rename, Suspend
public abstract class SingleChildCombinator
extends AbstractCombinator

An abstract superclass for Trull combinators with a single child.
